message:
SYSTEM: SPARQL_Streams.pdf: Página 7
SPARQL and Relational Algebra
Relational algebra semantics for SPARQL equivalent to 
mapping-based semantics
Additional operators:
Outer union
Coalesce: †(a,b)->c(R): ∀t∈R, if t(a) NOT NULL then t(c) <- t(a) 
else t(c) <- t(b).
Semantics preserving query translation for RDBMS-based 
RDF stores
Storing RDF data in a RDBMS
Translation approach relies on RDF form
A. Chebotko, S. Lu, and F. Fotouhi. Semantics preserving SPARQL-to-SQL translation. 
Data & Knowledge Engineering, 68(10):973–1000, October 2009.
speaker: SYSTEM
